title: District Profile: The Race To Fill An Open Seat In Iowa's Third
teaser: Democrat Staci Appel and Republican David Young are in a close race to fill a soon-to-be vacant seat.
contentencoded:
In this week’s District Profile, we turn to Iowa’s third congressional district, where Democrat Staci Appel and Republican David Young are in a close race to fill the seat being vacated by retiring Republican Representative Tom Latham.

Sarah Boden of Iowa Public Radio joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the race.

  • See more District Profiles in our series

Guest

  • Sarah Boden, reporter for Iowa Public Radio. She tweets @Sarah_Boden.
